Title: Parents Just Don't Understand
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Dan Levy, Lauren Bans (executive story editor), Matt Mira (executive story editor), Erik Weiner (executive story editor), Aaron Kaczander (story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: A song written by Adam and Barry doesn't get the accolades they hoped for, while Erica needs distance from Beverly.
